lessons.text: - Root cause: huge JSON blobs encoded in onclick attributes (encodeURIComponent of full file content)
**NEVER use em dash ( — ) anywhere. Ever.** Use hyphen (-) or rewrite. Added to SOUL.md as non-negotiable.
**Article = article only.** No thread version unless explicitly asked.
**Emojis where appropriate** - headers, bullets, emphasis. Natural not forced.
**Verified data only** - no made-up stats, no fabricated quotes. If unverified, label it or skip it. Sources cited at bottom.
Key insight: Polymarket's official 5-min markets could compete with/replace Chainlink games for our sniper strategy. Better liquidity, potential airdrop farming angle.

decisions.action: Fix: switched to `fileIndex[]` array - onclick just passes an integer index, content looked up from memory
decisions.outcome: Fix: switched to `fileIndex[]` array - onclick just passes an integer index, content looked up from memory

relationships.insight: - Purpose: whenever Chartist asks for a thread/article, it goes straight here and auto-appears on dashboard
- Rewritten from thread to article-only format per Chartist's instruction
